entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then flurries changing to rain showers and flurries near noon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023
